entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text: @OHSAASports If 77% of coronavirus cases in Ohio (according to Dewine) are nursing home related, why can’t they order nursing home patients to stay away from youth athletic events, proms and graduations? Why the order to keep healthy kids away from healthy activities? This is wrong!
